unnormalised: Are you an aspiring influencer from Mumbai dreaming of cracking that brand deal with Amul? Or maybe a small business in Delhi trying to boost sales? Then listen up! Understanding your follower analytics is no longer optional; itâ€™s absolutely crucial.
normalised: Are you an aspiring influencer from Mumbai dreaming of cracking that brand deal with Amul? Or maybe a small business in Delhi trying to boost sales? Then listen up! Understanding your follower analytics is no longer optional; it is absolutely crucial.

unnormalised: Gone are the days of simply counting likes. Smart brands like Manyavar want to see DEEP insights: follower demographics (age, location - think how many are actually in your target area, like, say, Bandra), engagement rates (who's actually clicking those links!), and even follower authenticity. Are they real people or just bots inflating your numbers?
normalised: Gone are the days of simply counting likes. Smart brands like Manyavar want to see D E E P insights: follower demographics (age, location - think how many are actually in your target area, like, say, Bandra), engagement rates (who is actually clicking those links!), and even follower authenticity. Are they real people or just bots inflating your numbers?

unnormalised: Several new platforms are emerging to help you dig deep, offering affordable packages starting from Rs. 500/month. Dr. Sharma from IIT-Bombay even suggests using these tools to tailor content. Forget generic posts, target specific niches like "foodies in Chennai" or "fitness enthusiasts in a 100 sq ft gym in Kolkata". This level of precision is what gets results! So, start analyzing those numbers, folks! Your wallet will thank you later.
